newmap_g7:
More Monsters

Outposts, like your Main Yard, can be used to hatch monsters and greatly increase the size of your attack force.
newmap_g8: If at any point, you want to opt out of the World Map, just recycle your Map Room. If you want to opt back into the World Map, simply build and upgrade your Map Room again. (Note: You'll be placed in a new part of the world with different players around you.)
whatsnew_mr2range:
A Better World for All
Spend less time on the nitty gritty details and more time expanding your empire! Harvesters in your Outposts will now bank resources automatically over time, and the Flinger range in your Main Yard has been drastically increased to give you many more targets to destroy. Start your world domination now!
msg_mr2pop_desc: Shake up your worldview. Upgrade your Map Room to Level 2 and expand your empire -- more resources, more yards, and more victims await you.
fbcncp_desc1: Facebook is offering an 80% discount on Facebook Credits. If you spend $1.00, you'll receive 50 Credits (a $5.00 value).
fbcncp_desc2: If you take advantage of this offer, we'll upgrade your Town Hall to the next level for FREE!
whatsnew_instant_starterkits:
Instantly Build Starter Kits!
If you pay with Shiny, your Starter Kit is ready to go immediately. No more waiting for days while your buildings upgrade. Same price as before!
whatsnew_underhall_lvl6:
Level 6 Under Hall
This unlocks additional resource storage, tower levels, monster levels and more!
popup_prefab_instantnotice: Starter Kits purchased with shiny are built instantly and you aren't charged for build time!
mon_korathdesc: Spawned in the magma pits of Inferno, Korath uses his massive body and fiery core to eliminate enemies.
mm_goal1_desc: To find Korath, you'll need to destroy and take over multiple Outposts.  You'll improve your chances of finding this new Champion by aiming for higher level Outposts.  He may be found in weaker Outposts as well, but it will take you longer to track him down.
mm_goal2_desc: Good job capturing Korath. This Champion from the depths of Inferno has special abilities, like the Breath of Fire. This attack enables him to spit fiery orbs at aerial monsters. Keep taking over Outposts to unlock this ability.
mm_goal3_desc: Korath's other special ability is called the Fists of Doom. Korath slams both fists into the ground, creating an earthquake-like effect that damages everything close enough to feel the tremor. Keep taking over Outposts to unlock this ability.
mm_nomr2_desc: Korath, the Champion from the depths of Inferno, is on the loose, but you're not quite ready to capture him yet. To participate in the Monster Madness event, you will need to upgrade your Map Room to Level 2.
mm_goal1_completed1: Congratulations! You found Korath, but there's no place for him to live in your base.  If you want to raise him as part of your monster army, you'll need to build a Champion Cage so he'll have a safe place to stay.
mm_goal1_completed2: Congratulations! You found Korath!  However, your Champion Cage is currently occupied by #v1#. You can only raise one Champion at a time in your Cage. If you build a Champion Chamber, you'll be able to put #v2# on ice and raise Korath in your Cage.
mm_goal1_completed3: Congratulations! You found Korath!  To make him part of your monster army, open your Champion Cage and start raising him.
mm_goal1_completed4: Congratulations! You found Korath!  However, your Champion Cage is currently occupied by #v1#. You can only raise one Champion at a time in your Cage. Open your Champion Chamber, and put #v2# on ice, so you can raise Korath in your Cage.
mm_goal2_completed: Well done! You discovered Korath's Breath of Fire ability! He can now spew fiery projectiles at any flying monsters who get too close.
mm_goal3_completed: Great job! You discovered Korath's Fists of Doom ability! He will now periodically slam the ground with his massive fists, causing a tremor and damaging everything within range.
mm_pop_both1: Moloch's favorite Inferno pet, Korath, has abandoned him. It seems Korath has developed a taste for Putty, and he's been running around the Outposts in the World Map on a gluttonous binge. If you can capture him, he would add a big boost to your monster army. The search begins March 22nd.
mm_pop_both2: Moloch's runaway pet, Korath, sure does love Putty. He's indiscriminately going from Outpost to Outpost, eating all he can. He's like a hyper kid on a sugar high, and you can add him to your monster army if you can find him. Your chance to capture him will begin on March 22nd.
mm_pop_both3: Korath doesn't seem to be slowing down. He's still running around the World Map on a crazy binge. Who knew Putty was such a delicious treat for an Inferno champion? Are you ready to go capture him starting at 12 p.m. PST on March 22nd?
mm_pop_both4: The time has come to make Moloch's pet, Korath, your own! Search high and low for him by taking over Outposts in the World Map. Once you find him, you can bring him back to your base and help him grow with a healthy diet of Inferno Monsters.
mm_pop_mronly1: The Lord of Inferno has lost his favorite pet, Korath. It seems Korath has developed a taste for Putty, and he's been running around the Outposts in the World Map on a gluttonous binge. If you can capture him, he would add a big boost to your monster army. The search begins March 22nd.
mm_pop_mronly2: Korath sure does love Putty. He's indiscriminately going from Outpost to Outpost, eating all he can. He's like a hyper kid on a sugar high, and you can add him to your monster army if you can find him. Your chance to capture him will begin on March 22nd.
mm_pop_mronly3: Korath doesn't seem to be slowing down. Even without the nourishment of Inferno monsters, he's still running around the World Map on a crazy binge.  Are you ready to go capture him starting at 12 p.m. PST on March 22nd?
mm_pop_mronly4: The time has come to capture Korath! Search high and low for him by taking over Outposts in the World Map. Once you find him, he's yours to keep, but you'll need to brave the depths of Inferno to produce the healthy diet of monsters he needs to grow.
mm_pop_infonly1: Moloch's favorite Inferno pet, Korath, has abandoned him. It seems Korath has developed a taste for Putty, and he's been running around the Outposts in the World Map on a gluttonous binge. If you upgrade your Map Room, you can capture him. The search begins March 22nd.
mm_pop_infonly2: Moloch's runaway pet, Korath, sure does love Putty. He's indiscriminately going from Outpost to Outpost, eating all he can. He's like a hyper kid on a sugar high, and you can add him to your monster army if you upgrade your Map Room to Level 2. Your chance to capture him will begin on March 22nd.
mm_pop_infonly3: Korath doesn't seem to be slowing down. He's still running around the World Map on a crazy binge. Who knew Putty was such a delicious treat for an Inferno champion? Upgrade your Map Room to have a chance to capture him starting at 12 p.m. PST on March 22nd.
mm_pop_infonly4: The time has come to make Moloch's pet, Korath, your own! Upgrade your Map Room and then initiate the search by taking over Outposts. Once you find him, you can bring him back to your base and help him grow with a healthy diet of Inferno Monsters.
mm_pop_neitherclose1: The Lord of Inferno has lost his favorite pet, Korath. It seems Korath has developed a taste for Putty, and he's been running around the Outposts in the World Map on a gluttonous binge. If you upgrade your Map Room, you can capture him. The search begins March 22nd.
mm_pop_neitherclose2: Korath sure does love Putty. He's indiscriminately going from Outpost to Outpost, eating all he can. He's like a hyper kid on a sugar high, and you can add him to your monster army if you upgrade your Map Room to Level 2. Your chance to capture him will begin on March 22nd.
mm_pop_neitherclose3: Korath doesn't seem to be slowing down. He's still running around the World Map on a crazy binge. Who knew Putty was such a delicious treat for an Inferno champion? Upgrade your Map Room to have a chance to capture him starting at 12 p.m. PST on March 22nd.
mm_pop_neitherclose4: The time has come to capture Korath! Upgrade your Map Room then search for him by taking over Outposts. Once you find him, he's yours to keep, but you'll need to brave the depths of Inferno to produce the healthy diet of monsters he needs to grow.
mm_pop_neither1: The Lord of Inferno has lost his favorite pet, Korath. It seems Korath has developed a taste for Putty, and he's been running around the Outposts in the World Map on a gluttonous binge. If you build up your base and upgrade your Map Room, you can capture him. The search begins March 22nd.
mm_pop_neither2: Korath sure does love Putty. He's indiscriminately going from Outpost to Outpost, eating all he can. He's like a hyper kid on a sugar high, and you can add him to your monster army if you build up your base and upgrade your Map Room to Level 2. Your chance to capture him will begin on March 22nd.
mm_pop_neither3: Korath doesn't seem to be slowing down. He's still running around the World Map on a crazy binge. Who knew Putty was such a delicious treat for an Inferno champion? Upgrade your Map Room to have a chance to capture him starting at 12 p.m. PST on March 22nd.
mm_pop_neither4: The time has come to capture Korath! Upgrade your Map Room then search for him by taking over Outposts. Once you find him, he's yours to keep, but you'll need to brave the depths of Inferno to produce the healthy diet of monsters he needs to grow.
mm_goal3_completed2: Congratulations! You have found Korath and discovered all of his special abilities. Now he's ready to become a fully functional member of your monster army.
mm_alreadytaken: You have already taken over this Outpost and discovered all of its secrets. You won't gain any progress by taking it over again. Are you sure you want to attack?
help_faq: Got a question? Others may have beat you to it. Check our FAQ.
help_guide: Need a fresh approach to game play? Let us be your guide!
help_support: Experiencing technical difficulties that other links can't solve? Contact our friendly Customer Support!
mm_korathunlocked_streambody: Moloch's precious pet is under new ownership. Let the blood and games begin!
mm_korathability1_streamtitle: #fname# unlocked Korath's Breath of Fire in Backyard Monsters.
mm_korathability1_streambody: Fire up the grill -- Korath's special ability turns flying monsters into barbecue!
mm_korathability2_streamtitle: #fname# unlocked Korath's Fists of Doom in Backyard Monsters.
mm_korathability2_streambody: Safe ground is a thing of the past -- Korath's footsteps leave one hell of a wake.
upgrade_monster_baiter: Upgrade the Wild Monster Baiter to increase size of attack
fp_snipercannon: You may still be safe from other players, but Wild Monsters remain at large. Build Sniper and Cannon Towers to protect your valuable resources.
fp_radiotower: Nervous about leaving your Yard vulnerable? Build a Radio Tower and get attack alerts while you're away.
fp_locker: Pokeys are fun, but there's a great big world of monsters out there. Build a Monster Locker and unlock bigger, stronger beasts.
fp_booby: You can now build Booby Traps! Strategically place these around your base to blow up any unsuspecting monsters who happen to step on them.
fp_blocks1: Tighten your defenses with Blocks. Use them to protect your buildings, or to funnel attacking monsters into Booby Traps.
fp_catapult1: Want to shred enemy buildings before flinging in a single monster? Build a Catapult and rain Twig Missiles on their defenses.
fp_blocks2: Wooden Blocks are great, but Stone Blocks will withstand more damage. Upgrade to Stone Blocks now!
fp_academy: Help your monsters gain strength, speed and durability when they earn their PhD in Advanced Destruction. Build a Monster Academy now.
fp_hcc_title: All Your Hatcheries Belong to Us
fp_hcc: Manage monster creation throughout your base from a single location with the Hatchery Control Center. Build one now.
fp_planner: With the Yard Planner, you can get a birds-eye view of your base and easily rearrange buildings to bolster your defenses. Build one now!
fp_juicer: Need more Goo? Construct a Juicer and grind monsters you no longer need back into Goo...and a little blood.
fp_bunker: Towers can only do so much when it comes to defense. Build a Bunker and let your monsters pull their weight in keeping your yard safe.
fp_baiter: Not sure how your defenses stack up? Test them with the Wild Monster Baiter and make modifications as needed. Build one now.
fp_tesla: Monsters love resources, but they hate electricity.  Build a high voltage Tesla Tower to zap any enemy that gets too close.
fp_laser: Who couldn't use more fire or plasma power? The Laser Tower will make short work of any monsters within range. Build one now.
fp_aerial: What has deadly aim and will protect you from flying monsters that many defenses miss? An Aerial Defense Tower. Build one now.
fp_cage: No attacking force is complete without a champion leading the charge. Build a Champion Cage and raise one of your very own.
fp_blocks3: More Blocks equals more durability. Upgrade your Blocks to Metal now.
fp_chamber: Want to raise a new Champion but can't bear to part with your old one? With the Champion Chamber, you can put him on ice while you raise another. Build a Chamber now and keep one of each frozen and thaw them out as you like.
fp_heavy_title: What They Can't See, CAN Hurt Them!
fp_heavy: Heavy Traps use a specialized trigger that only fires when the most powerful monsters step on it. Lay Traps now and watch the mighty fall.
fp_catapult2: Upgrade your Catapult now, and you'll be able to launch a Pebble Bomb that will cause more damage over a larger area.
fp_fortifications: Now you can fortify your buildings with extra layers of defense that slow down enemy monsters and help protect your valuable resources. Begin fortifying now!
fp_monsterlab: Build the Monster Laboratory and research top secret abilities for your monsters.
fp_railgun: Line'em up and mow'em down with an electrical gun that makes up for its limited range with high damage and an infinite line of fire. Build a Railgun Tower now.
fp_blocks4: With more hitpoints, Gold Blocks will make your defenses stronger than ever before. Upgrade now!
fp_catapult3: Using Putty Rage in your next attack will send your monsters into a frenzy -- they'll attack faster, move faster, and bring your enemies down faster than ever. Launch it with the Catapult now.
fp_blocks5: Upgrade your Blocks to Black Diamond, and they'll be nearly impassable.
fp_alliances: Create or join an Alliance to protect yourself, aid friends or go after your greatest rival.
fp_strongbox: What's a whole new yard without a whole new set of monsters? Build a Strongbox and start unlocking these underworld beasts.
fp_sharpblast: You can be sure the enemy is just waiting for the chance to swipe your resources. Put up some Sharpshooters and Blast Towers to keep 'em at bay.
fp_chaos: Spread more death and destruction to your foes. Build the Chaos Lab and Factory to construct new weapons for battle.
fp_monstroe: No one's immune to Marilyn Monstroe's charms. Unlock her in the Chaos Lab and use her feminine wiles to lure defending monsters into her explosive grasp.
fp_loototron: Get a head start on looting your enemies. The Loot-O-Tron 5000 will latch onto the top of enemy Town Halls and suck the resources right out of them. Unlock it now in the Chaos Lab.
fp_candyjars: Put a lid on enemy defenses. Drop empty Candy Jars on defensive towers to keep them occupied while you go in for the kill. Unlock them now in the Chaos Lab.
fp_quakeabove: Harness the power of the underworld! Get a Quake Tower in Inferno as well as your Backyard. However, you will need an Inferno Yard to collect Bone, Coal, and Sulfur in order to construct this devastating tower. Build now.
fp_quake: Harness the power of the underworld! Get a Quake Tower in Inferno as well as your Backyard. However, you will need an Inferno Yard to collect Bone, Coal, and Sulfur in order to construct this devastating tower. Build now.
fp_magma: Your Inferno worker has secrets to tell. He's finally sharing... with a little encouragement. The secret to the Magma Tower is now yours. Build one now.
fp_infacademy: Take your Inferno Monsters to the next level. Build the Infernal Academy and make your underground demons more powerful through a boot camp from hell.
fp_idlelocker: Don't let your Monster Locker sit idle. Start unlocking the #v1#.
fp_idleacademy: Your monsters can cause even more damage if you teach them a thing or two. Open an Academy and whip them into shape.
fp_idlemonsterlab: Teach your monsters new and powerful abilities. Don't let your Monster Laboratory sit idle for too long.
fp_idledescent: There's a strange new world beneath your feet. Fight your way to Moloch and claim your Inferno Base now -- new monsters, new weapons, new enemies to crush. Start the Descent!
fp_idlechaos: Chaos Weapons are ideal for torturing your enemies. Open your Chaos Lab and start #v1# #v2# now!
fp_idlestrongbox: Put your Strongbox to work. Start unlocking the #v1#.
fp_idleinfacademy: Your Inferno monsters are waiting to learn a few tricks. Open an Infernal Academy and whip them into shape.
fp_idlemr2: Shake up your worldview with a Level 2 Map Room and expand your empire -- more resources, more yards, and more victims await you. Upgrade to Level 2 now.
fp_3_14_0: Fire and brimstone have spread to your Yard -- build a Magma Tower above ground and send enemy monsters scattering for cover.
fp_magmaabove: Fire and brimstone have spread to your Yard -- build a Magma Tower above ground and send enemy monsters scattering for cover.
str_code_enli_stream: #fname# just expanded their Inferno Yard by another 10%.
str_code_enli_streambody: Pop the champagne, #fname# just purchased more land to build on.
str_code_enli_body: Your Inferno yard is now larger than ever, giving you more space to build.
fp_event1pop1: Your monsters are growing restless. Word of the new Wild Brukkarg Tribe has spread, and your beasts crave their blood. Go on the offensive and destroy the Brukkarg Tribe before they set roots.
fp_event1pop2: Your monsters are ferocious, but they have yet to be truly tested. Lead them to victory by attacking the lethal Brukkarg Tribe and earn the respect of your enemies.
fp_event1pop3: The time is close at hand. Are you ready to draw first blood? The Brukkarg Tribe will not be easy to put down. Prepare for combat.
fp_event1start: Let the slaughter begin! Attack the battle-hardened Brukkarg Tribe and eliminate all their yards. Destroy them and add Vorg to your arsenal -- his healing touch will come in handy when things get bloody.
fp_event1reward_title: The Trick to a Good Victory...
fp_event1reward: Congratulations! Victory, Vorg, and his mysterious healing properties are now yours.
fp_event1end: The Brukkarg are already a distant memory, but there's always a tribe that needs to suffer your art of war.
event1reward_streamtitle: #fname# destroyed the Brukkarg Tribe in Backyard Monsters: Creature Carnage.
event1reward_streambody: There's nothing left of the Brukkarg to claim but teeth, claws, and dented armor.
fp_event2pop1: Rumors have begun to spread across the Backyard Universe. Wild Monsters seem bent on learning the secrets of your defenses by tearing them down, one piece at a time. Can your fortifications withstand the onslaught?
fp_event2pop2: Can your Towers defend the home base you've worked so hard to create? We'll soon find out.
fp_event2pop3: Wild Monsters continue to plot to overthrow your Yard and adopt your defensive strategies for their own. When they come for you, it won't be pretty. Prepare for the fury.
fp_event2start: That rumble you hear is a horde of Wild Monsters coming to lay claim to your yard. Battle through 10 Waves of Wild Monster attacks. Defend your Yard and win an unholy creature birthed in the fire swamps -- terror, thy name is Slimeattikus.
fp_event2reward: Congratulations! Slimeattikus now belongs to you. Corner this fissioning monster, and the last thing you'll hear is your own screams.
fp_event2end: In the Backyard, some truths are universal -- never let your guard down.
event2reward_streamtitle: #fname# dominated Monster Blitzkrieg in Backyard Monsters.
event2reward_streambody: Blood on the grass and enemy monster bones in your teeth -- it's a good day to be alive.
fp_event3pop1: Moloch, a sneaky underworld overlord, has grown tired of his own domain and is ready to make a play for yours. His minions don't play fair. Keep your wits about you...
fp_event3pop2: Moloch is through laying low. Are you strong enough to defeat his hellish beasts? With a little luck and a lot of strategy, you can survive.
fp_event3pop3: Moloch's Inferno Monsters are planning a full-scale assault on your Yard. How many hits can you stand? Crush 10 Waves of Monsters and prove you're invincible.
fp_event3start: Let the bloodbath begin! Moloch's Inferno Monsters have only one purpose -- to destroy. Litter your Yard with their limbs and claim total victory by crushing 10 Waves. Win access to two Magma Towers for your Main Yard.
fp_event3reward: Congratulations! You've won two Magma Towers. Let the blood and lava flow!
fp_event3end: Moloch's gone back to his underground lair to lick his wounds, but he's never down for long.
event3reward_streamtitle: #fname# defeated the beasts of Inferno in Backyard Monsters: Hell-Raisers.
event3reward_streambody: Nothing's hotter than Inferno Monsters charbroiled in your own backyard.
fp_3_16_0: Don't be surprised to see familiar faces -- your Inferno Map is now synced with your above ground Map Room. You can also extend the reach of you underground lair by purchasing Yard Expansion for your Inferno Base.
mon_vorgdesc: Hatched in giant hives deep inside the asteroid belt, Vorg are flying alien healers with a penchant for mischief.
msg_rsvpconfirmed: You're all set to receive updates at #v1#.
fp_3_17_0: Are your monsters in need of medical attention? Vorg, an alien hatched deep inside the asteroid belt, is at your service. Unlock this winged healer now in the Monster Locker.
mon_vorgstream: The genome has been cracked, #fname# has unlocked Vorg! Vorg is tiny healer that will do its best to keep your monsters alive and fighting.
mon_vorgstreambody: Raised and bred by the Brukkarg tribe, these tiny healers will do their best to keep your monsters fighting.
mon_slimeattikusdesc:
An unholy biological terror birthed in the Bangweulu Swamps of Zambia, the Slimeattikus dissolves foes on contact and fissions when attacked.
Favorite Target: Anything
fp_3_18_0: Get a sample of this biological terror and build your own Slimeattikus who will splatter into multiple monsters that will continue to eat away your enemies' yards.
ai_brukkarg_description: Out of nowhere, the Brukkarg attacks! Looks like they enjoy preying on the young and helpless.
ai_brukkarg_succ: It'll be a long time before the Brukkarg Tribe thinks about messing with you again.
ai_brukkarg_succstream: #fname# just destroyed a Brukkarg monster base. They'll think twice before they try to come back into #fname#'s base.
ai_brukkarg_taunt: We're coming in your base to mess up your face!
ai_brukkarg_fail: Your attack failed. Raise a new army and attack them again before they start repairing!
basePlanner_overwrite: You are about to overwrite #v1#. Are you sure you want to continue?
basePlanner_unsaved: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to continue?
basePlanner_cantApply: You must place all non-decorative buildings before you can apply this layout to your yard.
basePlanner_moveTool: Move Tool - Click to move your buildings.
basePlanner_storageTool: Store Tool - Click to place buildings in your Inventory.
basePlanner_expandTool: Expand Tool - Click to increase the size of your yard.
basePlanner_clearTool: Clear - Click to place all buildings in your Inventory.
basePlanner_saveTool: Save - Click to save this layout.
basePlanner_loadTool: Load - Click to view and edit a saved layout.
basePlanner_applyTool: Apply - Click to use this layout in your Yard.
fp_yp2_title: The New Yard Planner: What You Crave
fp_yp2: The wait is over -- the New Yard Planner is coming in hot. Get more tools to make designing a breeze. Create and save templates to change your layout instantly. Check it out and see what the fuss is about.
fp_event_kothpromo1_desc: Power doesn't come easy in the Backyard Universe. It's born in blood and the heat of battle. A new Champion Monster known as Krallen, is on the hunt for a master. He answers only to the best. Prove yourself on June 11.
fp_event_kothpromo2_desc: Krallen craves power, and nothing is a bigger lure to him than loot. He loves wreaking havoc to obtain it, and he loves hoarding it. Want to win his devotion? It's all about the loot on June 11. Greed is good.
fp_event_kothpromo3_desc: Krallen loves a bloodthirsty master almost as much as he loves loot. Impress him by meeting a killer quota. Attract him with your ruthlessness in battle, keep him by staying on top of your game. Are you ready for June 11?
fp_event_kothstart_desc: Attack and loot as many Yards as you can to hit your quota. Once you win Krallen's approval, you'll have to fight to keep his attention. Lose your loot, and you lose his favor. Earn his loyalty now!
fp_event_kothpromo1mr1_desc: Power doesn't come easy in the Backyard Universe. It's born in the heat of battle. A new Champion Monster, Krallen, is on the hunt for a master. He answers only to the best. To participate and prove yourself on June 11, upgrade to Map Room 2.
fp_event_kothpromo2mr1_desc: Nothing is a bigger lure to Krallen than loot. He loves wreaking havoc to obtain it, and he loves hoarding it. Want to win his devotion? It's all about the loot on June 11. Upgrade to Map Room 2 and start wreaking havoc. Greed is good.
fp_event_kothpromo3mr1_desc: Upgrade to Map Room 2 and meet a killer quota to impress Krallen. Get him with your ruthlessness in battle, keep him by staying on top of your game. Are you ready for June 11?
fp_event_kothstartmr1_desc: Want a chance to win Krallen's approval? Upgrade to Map Room 2 to begin attacking and looting as many Yards as possible to hit an inspiring quota. Lose your loot, and you lose his favor. Upgrade now!
msg_stopconstructionoutpostbuilding: You cannot stop the construction of a building in your Outposts.
krallen_desc:
Hunt for Krallen:
Krallen is quite particular about who wields the power -- he only obeys top looters. Hit your resource looting quota each week to keep him happy, or he'll leave you for the next powerful player he can find. Impress him by going above and beyond with your looting, and he'll learn a special ability. Hold him for consecutive weeks, and he'll only grow stronger and more rabid for loot.
mon_krallendesc: Born in the blood-soaked grasslands of southeast Asia, Krallen can survive in any climate - wet or dry. He thinks only of his next kill.
krallen_nogcage: You must build a Champion Cage if you want to participate in the Hunt for Krallen
msg_recycle_mr2krallen: Are you sure you want to recycle?
msg_krallen_nomr2: You must upgrade your Map Room to Level 2 if you want to participate in the Hunt for Krallen
krallen_lootbuff_tooltip: Loot Buff: Krallen buffs nearby monsters' ability to loot. Loot #v1# resources this week to unlock.
krallen_lootbuffactive_tooltip: Loot Buff: Krallen buffs nearby monsters' ability to loot.
fp_kothendwin: Congratulations! You've gained a worthy ally. Hold onto your loot to take advantage of this savage Champion Monster. The longer you maintain your quota, the greater his abilities grow.
fp_kothendlose_title: If At First You Don't Succeed...
fp_kothendlose: Krallen will not be won so easily. With a little luck and some monster blood, you can draw him to your side. Regroup, build your monster army and make it your mission to keep hitting your quota. Your time will come.
fp_kothendkeep: Congratulations! You've impressed Krallen and he's decided to stick around for another week. He's now level #v1#.
fp_kothendlosekrallen: Krallen's loyalty follows the loot -- he's left you to pursue more powerful players. Regroup, attack without mercy, keep hitting your quota, and he'll come back to you.
fp_krallenrisk: The clock's ticking, and you're dangerously close to losing Krallen's devotion. Beef up your army and spill some monster blood. You have less than a day to hit your loot quota before Krallen abandons you in search of greener pastures.
fp_krallenwin: You've put on a bloody good show -- Krallen is taking notice. The loot quota is within reach -- crush your enemies, continue looting, and Krallen will be yours!
fp_kothquota1_havekrallen: Congratulations! You've convinced this savage Champion Monster you're worthy of his service -- he'll stick around for another week. Return to your Yard on Monday to make use of your very own Level #v1# Krallen.
fp_kothquota1_nokrallen: Congratulations! Krallen begins his service on Monday. Keep meeting your quota to stay in his good graces -- the longer you keep hitting your quota, the greater his abilities grow.
fp_kothquota2_title: Krallen's a Team Player -- For the Right Price
fp_kothquota2: Krallen's a giver -- you've impressed him with your power and now he's ready to return the favor by buffing all nearby monsters' ability to loot.
bdg_dave_trophy_desc: You're a a proud member of the D.A.V.E. Club -- display your statue and brag to your friends.
daveClub_promo_desc1:
• 1,000 Shiny per month
  • Inferno monsters and increased Capacity in Hatchery Control Center queue
daveClub_promo_desc2:
• Commemorative D.A.V.E. statue
  • Solid gold D.A.V.E.s
  • 8 additional Yard Planner save slots
  • Customizable yard tiles
fb_kothstream_desc: How long will #fname# be able to tame this loot-crazed beast?
fp_promodaveclub_title: D.A.V.E. Club: The New Gold Standard
fp_promodaveclub: Ready to up your game? Join the D.A.V.E. Club now to experience a new standard of monstrous excellence. Perks that await you include extra Shiny each month, exclusive Yard skin customizations and 8 additional Yard Planner save slots!
dc_panel_benefitsdesc:
• 1,000 Shiny per month
  • Larger Hatchery Control Center queue
  • Inferno monsters in Hatchery Control Center queue
  • Commemorative D.A.V.E. statue
  • Solid gold D.A.V.E.s
  • 8 additional Yard Planner save slots
dc_benefits_desc:
• 1,000 Shiny per month
  • Larger Hatchery Control Center queue
  • Inferno monsters in Hatchery Control Center queue
  • Commemorative D.A.V.E. statue
  • Solid gold D.A.V.E.s
  • 8 additional Yard Planner save slots
dc_benefits_renew: You will receive another 1,000 Shiny when your subscription renews on: #v1#
dc_benefits_expire: Your membership has been canceled and will expire on: #v1#
hcc_msg_recycle: Are you sure you want to recycle this building? You will lose the Goo for any monsters that may be in the queue.This can not be undone
krallen_tooltip_ability1: this is krallen's super awesome ability1
dc_cancel_confirmation:
Are you sure you want to cancel? If you cancel now, you will lose:
  • 1,000 Shiny per month
  • Larger Hatchery Control Center queue
  • Inferno monsters in Hatchery Control Center queue
  • Commemorative D.A.V.E. statue
  • Solid gold D.A.V.E.s
  • 8 additional Yard Planner save slots
fp_townhall10: Having trouble fending off pesky attackers? Upgrade your Town Hall to Level 10! Beef up your defenses with more Blocks, more Heavy and Booby Traps, higher Level Defensive Towers and a higher Level Monster Bunker.
th_upgradeth10_msg: You may need to takeover more Outposts in Map Room 2 or purchase Improved Packing Skills in the Store to increase your resource capacity.
fp_promodaveclub2: Backyard real estate is booming! D.A.V.E. Club members now receive an additional eight save slots in their Yard Planner. Still not a member?
fp_event_bruwarpromo2: The bloodthirsty Brukkarg Tribe have been watching you and plotting their first strike. Do away with your attackers and you'll be handsomely rewarded.
fp_event_bruwarpromo3: They've been watching you, and now the time has finally come - are you ready for battle? The Brukkarg War begins tomorrow! Fight for what's yours, outlast the enemy, and the new Spurtz Cannon is yours!
fp_event_bruwarfinal_title: Can You Mess With The Best?
event_bruwarreward1_streamdesc: Monster corpses make nice Yard decorations.
event_bruwarreward2_streamtitle: #fname# Won A Second Spurtz Cannon in Backyard Monsters!
event_bruwarreward2_streamdesc: It's a Backyard battlefield - and these lethal twins don't miss!
event_bruwarreward3_streamtitle: #fname# Won Two Black Diamond Spurtz Cannons in Backyard Monsters!
event_bruwarreward3_streamdesc: Don't come too close if you like your head attached to your body!
fp_event_bruwarpromo1: Once thought to be extinct, the Brukkarg Wild Monster Tribe is coming to destroy you! Fortify your Yard and ready your monster militia - bloodshed is seven days away!
fp_bruwarreward1: The Spurtz Cannon is yours! Three rounds down, just two more to go! Make the Brukkarg Tribe pay!
bi_spurtzcannon_desc: Your very own Backyard shotgun! This Cannon fires a Spurtz militia to do your bidding - just what you need to stop groups of invaders dead in their tracks.
bi_blackspurtzcannon_desc: The Black Diamond Spurtz Cannon boasts stronger durability and reduced reloading times. Your enemies will need a monster miracle to get past these!
fp_event_bruwarbruwarattack4: You're almost there! It's now or never. Take this yard for all it's worth and show the Brukkargs they've challenged the wrong monsters!
fp_event_bruwarend: What's left of the Brukkarg assassins have gone back into hiding and your Backyard militia is stronger than ever!
fp_event_bruwarattack: Five waves of Brukkarg troops down! It's time for you to attack. Scare these monster stalkers back where they came from!
fp_event_bruwarreward3_title: Black Diamond is a Monster's Best Friend
event_bruwarreward1_streamtitle: #fname# Won A Spurtz Cannon in Backyard Monsters!
fp_event_bruwarreward3: You rule the Yard! Your new Black Diamond Spurtz Cannons will have your rivals running for the hills!
fp_event_bruwarreward2: Two Spurtz Cannons means double trouble for the next round of Backyard invaders! Keep 'em coming!
fp_event_bruwarreward1: The Spurtz Cannon is yours! Three rounds down, just two more to go! Make the Brukkarg Tribe pay!
fp_event_bruwarfinal: After stalking your every move, the Brukkarg Tribe has completely copied your yard! No one knows your layout better than you - channel your strengths and bury your weaknesses! Attack!
fp_event_bruwarbruwarattack3: 15 waves of predator Brukkargs wasted, just 10 to go! Show no mercy on this Yard and your new Spurtz Cannon will be mowing down monsters in no time!
fp_event_bruwarbruwarattack2: The Backyard battlefield is heating up! Lock and load - it's your move. There's more where that came from!
fp_event_bruwarbruwarattack: Five waves of Brukkarg troops down! It's time for you to attack. Scare these monster stalkers back where they came from!
fp_event_bruwarstart: Fight through five waves of Brukkarg attackers and then exact your coldblooded revenge! Survive all 25 brutal raids and blow your enemies away with five offensives of your own to win two deadly Black Diamond Spurtz Cannons!
fp_wotcpop1: Moloch's favorite Inferno pet, Korath, is on a rampage! He's developed an undeniable hunger for Putty, and has been tearing through Outposts to get his share. Are you powerful enough to control him? You'll have to find him first!
fp_wotcpop2: Korath can't be stopped! He loves chaos almost as much as he loves Putty. Your Outpost could be next! You'll need to track him down, capture him, and use him in your monster militia. Think you're ready for the hunt?
fp_wotcpop3: Korath's Putty tear has taken the World Map by storm. Countless Outposts are destroyed, and Putty supplies are depleted. Hunt Korath down and make him one of your own before he goes too far. Monster Madness begins tomorrow. Good luck!
fp_wotcstart: It's time to tame the mighty Korath! Take over as many Outposts as you can, gaining points toward this Champion with each assault. Korath will serve you loyally as long as you supply him a steady diet of Inferno Monsters. Happy hunting!
fp_wotcreward1: Congratulations - Korath is now one of your own! This monster of fire and brimstone will be a very valuable asset to your monster militia. Open the Champion Cage and let your brand new pet do the work from there!
wotcreward1_streambody: Moloch's precious pet is under new ownership. Let the blood and games begin!
fp_wotcreward2: It's heating up! Well done - you've earned Korath's Breath of Fire ability. Your new Champion can now spew fire at any flying monster that dares to come too close. Stay away!
wotcreward2_streamtitle: #fname# unlocked Korath's Breath of Fire in Backyard Monsters.
wotcreward2_streambody: Fire up the grill - Korath's special ability turns flying monsters into barbecue!
fp_wotcreward3: Great job! You've discovered Korath's Fists of Doom! This mighty monster will now punch the ground with his massive knuckles, causing a large tremor that damages everything within range. Hold on!
wotcreward3_streamtitle: #fname# unlocked Korath's Fists of Doom in Backyard Monsters.
wotcreward3_streambody: Safe ground is a thing of the past - Korath's footsteps leave one hell of a wake.
fp_wotcend: Korath's rampage could only last for so long! With Backyard Putty levels at an all time low, the Champion Korath has nowhere else to go. Better catch him next time!
tut_1b:
Welcome to Backyard Monsters!
Click Full Screen to view more of your Yard.
fp_wotcpop1live: Moloch's favorite Inferno pet, Korath, is on a rampage! He's developed an undeniable hunger for Putty, and has been tearing through Outposts to get his share. Are you powerful enough to control him? Try your luck starting 8/16!
fp_wotcpop2live: Korath can't be stopped! He loves chaos almost as much as he loves Putty. Your Outpost could be next! You'll need to track him down, capture him, and use him in your monster militia. The hunt begins 8/16 - think you're ready?
fp_wotcpop3live: Korath's Putty tear has taken the World Map by storm. Countless Outposts are destroyed, and Putty supplies are depleted. Hunt Korath down and make him one of your own before he goes too far. Monster Madness begins tomorrow. Good luck!
wotcreward3_streamdesc: Safe ground is a thing of the past - Korath's footsteps leave one hell of a wake.
mh_inferno_trans_txt: Inferno Transfer: Transfer monsters from your Inferno base into your housing.
mh_juicing_txt: Juice Monsters: Juice selected monsters from your housing.
tut_NWM_Step_2: This is the Backyard Monsters World Map. Your main yard is surrounded by Wild Monsters. Let's take back one of their outposts. Click on the Legionnaire Tribe outpost next to your yard.
tut_NWM_Step_3: Now that you've selected this Wild Monster base, click Attack/Scout to scout their base.
tut_NWM_Step_4:
You are now viewing the Wild Monster base. 

It looks like they have no defenses. 

Click Attack to begin your assault.
tut_NWM_Step_5:
On the left you can see the Pokeys you have in your housing. Click the ' ' icon to add them to the flinger.

Click and hold ' ' to add at least 15 Pokeys to the Flinger.
tut_NWM_Step_6:
Good, now select where you want to fling your monsters. 

You can't fling monsters too close to buildings, so make sure the drop zone circle is white before you click it.
tut_NWM_Step_7: Congratulations, you leveled their entire backyard base!
tut_NWM_Step_8:
Adding Wild Monster outposts to your empire changes the color of the light on each outpost you conquer.

Buildings with Blue Lights show that you own that part of the map.

Click Next to Continue.
tut_NWM_Step_9:
When you conquer a Wild Monster Outpost surrounding your Main Yard, it fortifies your Main Yard. 

Conquer all 6 surrounding outposts to maximize your defense. 

Click Next to Continue
tut_NWM_Step_10:
Cells shaded in Blue are within your Flicker range.  

You can attack anywhere within your range for free. 

Click Next to continue.
tut_NWM_Step_11:
Cells NOT shaded in Blue are outside your Flicker range.  

You can still attack these cells, but it will cost resources to do so. 

Click End to conclude the tutorial.
mr3_bookmarks_full_message: You cannot have more than #v1# bookmarks. Please delete one of your bookmarks before adding another.
tut_NWM_Step2: Wild Monsters are preparing to attack your yard. You need to build defenses. Let's build a sniper tower to protect your yard. Click on the Buildings menu.
tut_NWM_Step3: Here you can browse the different buildings you can add to your yard. Click on the Defensive buildings tab.
tut_NWM_Step5: Here you can see the description, requirements and cost of the Sniper Tower. Click Build.
tut_NWM_Step6: Build the sniper tower in your yard by clicking on the grass.
tut_NWM_Step7: Click on the Sniper Tower and select Speed Up.
tut_NWM_Step8: Buy "Close Enough" to finish the upgrade instantly. The Close Enough speed up is free for upgrades with 5 minutes or less remaining.
tut_NWM_Step9: Your Sniper Tower is complete and will now fire on any intruders that try to attack your base. Collect your reward!
tut_NWM_Step10: WHOA! Just in time, here come some Wild Monsters Don't worry, the Sniper Tower should make quick work of them, just sit back and watch the action.
tut_NWM_Step11: Oooh, looks like you completed a rather bloody quest for defending your yard. Don't forget to collect the reward by clicking on the completed Quest.
tut_NWM_Step12: That attack came from the nearby Legionnaire Wild Monster Tribe. Let's strike back before they get a chance to build up a larger attack!
tut_NWM_Step13: The first thing we need to do is build housing for your monster army. Click on the Buildings menu.
tut_NWM_Step17:
Place it somewhere in your yard. 

You can click and drag to move the yard around to find space.
tut_NWM_Step18: Select your Monster Housing then click on Speed Up.
tut_NWM_Step20:
We've recruited some Pokeys to help. Pokeys are a little slow and small but what they lack in strength the make up for in numbers!

Collect your reward now.
tut_NWM_Step21: Now let's build a flinger so we can fling our Pokeys into the enemy backyard. Click on the Buildings menu.
tut_NWM_Step24: Place it somewhere in your backyard (remember, you can click and drag to find space).
tut_NWM_Step25: Select your Flinger and then click "Speed Up".
tut_NWM_Step26: Since your Flinger takes more than 5 minutes to build, let's buy the "Finish Building NOW" speed up.
tut_NWM_Step27: Now let's build a map room so you find those Legionnaires and counter attack.
tut_NWM_Step30: Place the Map Room in your back yard.
tut_NWM_Step31: Now speed up the completion of your Map Room in the same way you did the Flinger.
tut_NWM_Step33: Now let's use the Map Room to find the Wild Monster Tribe that attacked you and strike back with your Pokey Army! Click on the Map menu.
tut_NWM_Step34:
This is the Backyard Monsters World Map. 

Your main yard is surrounded by Wild Monsters. Let's tack back one of their outposts. 

Click on the Legionnaire Tribe outpost next to your yard.
tut_NWM_Step36: You are now viewing the Wild Monster Base. It looks like they have no defenses. Click Attack to begin your assault.
tut_NWM_Step37:
On the left you can see the pokeys you have in your housing. Press the ' ' icon to add them to the Flinger.

Click and hold ' ' to add at least 10 to the Flinger.
tut_NWM_Step38: Good, now select where you want to fling them. You can't fling monsters too close to buildings, so make sure the drop zone circle is white before you click it.
tut_NWM_Step39: I bet they wish they had defenses now!
tut_NWM_Step41: Build a hatchery to start producing monsters! Click on the Buildings menu.
tut_NWM_Step45: Place the hatchery somewhere in your yard.
tut_NWM_Step46: Don't forget to Speed Up the construction of the Hatchery.
tut_NWM_Step48: Now that your Hatchery is ready, try turning some Goo into monsters. Click on the Hatchery and select View Hatchery.
tut_NWM_Step49: Click on Pokey to add it to the production queue. You can click on it several times to add more than one.
tut_NWM_Step50:
Good Work!

When you are done close the Hatchery.
tut_NWM_Step51: Unlocking Monsters and keeping your Hatchery in production requires Putty and Goo. Let's build some Putty and Goo Harvesters. Click on the Buildings menu.
tut_NWM_Step55: Now, place it in your back yard.
tut_NWM_Step56: Now build a Goo Factory. Click on the Buildings menu.
tut_NWM_Step59: Now, place it in your back yard.
tut_NWM_Step60: Nice job! Your backyard base is now ready for action! Try upgrading your Town Hall to unlock better buildings.
tut_NWM_Step61: Also build the "Monster Locker" and unlock new monsters.
tut_NWM_Step62: While this counter is here other players can't attack you.
tut_NWM_Step63:
Check the Quests like to see what you should be doing next to collect rewards.

Good luck!
fp_nwm: Join the New World Map for a whole new level of strategic gameplay. Control Strongholds,  Resource Outposts and hold Outpost Defenders to fortify your defenses. Instantly attack anywhere on the Map to show the Backyard who's boss!
nwm_confirm:
Join the New World Map for a whole new level of strategic gameplay! Control Strongholds and Resource Outposts, improve your defenses, and attack anywhere on the Map.
Warning: By jumping into the New World Map, you will lose any Outposts you currently control, as well as monsters in your bunkers. After joining, you will be unable to return to your previous world.
nwm_ap_declarewar_desc:
Declare War
Increased Flinger range, capacity, and target lock time.
nwm_ap_armament_desc:
Armament
Tower and Block hit points increased. Booby Trap damaged increased.

fp_recapturedrull: We see you've returned to the Backyard! Here's a fully upgraded Drull to help you jump back into destructive landscaping.
fp_recapturegorgo: We see you've returned to the Backyard! Here's a fully upgraded Gorgo to help you jump back into destructive landscaping.

nwm_confirm_force: Welcome to the New World Map for a whole new level of strategic gameplay! Control Strongholds and Resource Outposts, improve your defenses, and attack anywhere on the Map.
prize_description_rezghul: Introducing Rezghul - the Backyard resurrector! This mighty monster can bring fellow monsters back from the dead at will, making Rezghul the perfect addition to any Backyard barrage.
prize_description_spurtz_cannon_1: Your very own Backyard shotgun! This Cannon fires a Spurtz militia to do your bidding - just what you need to stop groups of invaders dead in their tracks.
prize_description_spurtz_cannon_bd: The Black Diamond Spurtz Cannon boasts stronger durability and reduced reloading times. Your enemies will need a monster miracle to get past these!
prize_description_unlock_vorg: Hatched in giant hives deep inside the asteroid belt, Vorg are flying alien healers with a penchant for mischief.
prize_description_unlock_slimeattikus: An unholy biological terror birthed in the Bangweulu Swamps of Zambia, the Slimeattikus dissolves foes on contact and fissions when attacked.
prize_description_korath: Spawned in the magma pits of Inferno, Korath uses his massive body and fiery core to eliminate enemies.
prize_description_korath_ability_1: This Champion from the depths of Inferno has special abilities, like the Breath of Fire. This attack enables him to spit fiery orbs at aerial monsters.
prize_description_korath_ability_2: Korath's other special ability is called the Fists of Doom. Korath slams both fists into the ground, creating an earthquake-like effect that damages everything close enough to feel the tremor.
mon_rezghul: This mighty monster can bring fellow monsters back from the dead at will, making Rezghul the perfect addition to any Backyard barrage.
prize_locked_spurtz_cannon_2: You must purchase one Spurtz Cannon before you can purchase a second one.
prize_locked_spurtz_cannon_bd: You must purchase a second Spurtz Cannon before you can upgrade to Black Diamond Spurtz Cannons.
prize_locked_korath_ability_1: You must purchase Korath to unlock  Breath of Fire.
prize_locked_korath_ability_2: You must purchase Korath's Breath of Fire ability to unlock his Fists of Doom ability.
msg_err_nocells: No open cells near user! Try another world.
fp_hellraiserspop1: There's something eerie happening in the New World Map. A brand new monster resident, Rezghul, has been popping up in places you'd least expect. It seems wherever he goes, chaos ensues. Think you can tame him? Prove it March 21st!
prize_description_spurtz_cannon_2: The more firepower the better! Man your Backyard defenses with double the Spurtz Cannons and watch invading monsters run for the hills!
event_store: Introducing the Event Store! Your spot to spend the points you've earned throughout Hellraisers. The mighty Rezghul, and prizes from past events, will all be up for grabs. The Event Store will be open for the duration of Hellraisers and will end 24 hours after the event ends. Best of luck!
fp_hellraiserspop2: We need your help! Rezghul has begun reanimating fallen monsters and is turning the New World Map into a disaster area! You must destroy all Inferno yards in sight before the mighty Rezghul gets his way. Will you be ready March 21st?
fp_hellraiserspop3: Rezghul's rampage hasn't let up! He's leaving a wake of reanimated monsters in his path. Someone must stop the chaos on the New World Map before it's too late! Hellraisers starts March 21st - get ready for action!
fp_hellraisersstart: It's time to tame the mystical Rezghul! Destroy all Inferno yards you can get your hands on. Remember - the higher level of the yard, the more points you'll win. Create enough chaos and Rezghul could be yours. Good luck!
fp_hellraisersend: Great work! You've destroyed countless Inferno yards and the New World Map is safe once again. Did you unlock the mighty Rezghul?
fp_heallraiserspop1_upgrade: Inferno yards are about to pop up everywhere - we need your help! Hellraisers begins March 21st. Upgrade to the New World Map now so you don't miss out!
fp_heallraiserspop2_upgrade: Rezghul is reanimating fallen monsters all over the New World Map. Upgrade now so you don't miss your chance to tame this mighty monster!
fp_heallraiserspop3_upgrade: You're running out of time - Hellraisers begins on the 21st! Upgrade to the New World Map today so you don't miss out!
fp_null_upgrade: Inferno yards are about to pop up everywhere - we need your help! Hellraisers begins March 21st. Upgrade to the New World Map now so you don't miss out!
fp_hellraiserspop1_upgrade: Inferno yards are about to pop up everywhere - we need your help! Hellraisers begins March 21st. Upgrade to the New World Map now so you don't miss out!
fp_hellraiserspop2_upgrade: Rezghul is reanimating fallen monsters all over the New World Map. Upgrade now so you don't miss your chance to tame this mighty monster!
fp_hellraiserspop3_upgrade: You're running out of time - Hellraisers begins March 21st! Upgrade to the New World Map today so you don't miss out!
fp_hellraisersstart_upgrade: It's time to tame the mystical Rezghul! But you can only join in the carnage if you're in the New World Map! Make the switch, create enough chaos and Rezghul could be yours. Good luck!
hellraiser_des_pl1: Moloch's gone back to his underground lair to lick his wounds, but he's never down for long. Your reward:
hellraiser_attackended_failed: Are you tough enough to defeat the hellish creatures from inferno? Heal your monsters and try again!
mon_rezghuldesc: This mighty monster can bring fellow monsters back from the dead at will, making Rezghul the perfect addition to any Backyard barrage.
auto_upgraded2: You will be automatically moved to the New World Map on May 16th.
fp_auto_upgraded2: Backyard Monsters is closing Map Room 2 and has started automatically relocating players to the New World Map.  The whole process will take approximately a week. Click the button to move yourself now!
